colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B ('DIR JO BO LHAN CCIG GI LUGS KYI RJE BRTZUN MA NYI SHU RTZA GCIG GI SGRUB THABS DANG, LAS TSOGS SO SO'I BSGRUB TSUL GSAL BAR BRJOD PA DNGOS GRUB RNAM GNYIS KYI BANG MDZOD CES BYA BA 'DI NI, RNAM DKAR GYI BSOD NAMS YAN LAG BZHI PA'I DPUNG GIS YANGS PA'I NOR 'DZIN MTHA' DAG LA DBANG BSGYUR ZHING, SNGON GYIS SKYONG DAM PA RNAMS DANG RJES SU MTHUN PA, DAD SOGS 'PHAGS PA'I NOR BDUN GYIS MNGON PAR MDZES SHING, GCIG TU ZAB MO'I RNAL 'BYOR @010A *, ,LA GZHOL BA'I THUGS MNGA' BA SKYID SHOD NAS SDE BA RIN PO CHE GA-YUL RGYAL NOR BU'I BKAS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, BYA BRAL GYI BTZUN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS CHOS 'KHOR RGYAL BKRA SHIS MI 'GYUR LHUN GYIS GRUB PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS SU GYUR CIG , ,,)
